about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a digital marketing leader who thrives at the intersection of SEO, AI innovation, and strategic growth. My passion lies in transforming data into actionable insights and building tools that make marketing smarter, not harder.
about.achievements: Over the past decade, I've pioneered AI-driven SEO strategies that have delivered exceptional results - including a 180% increase in organic traffic and doubled conversion rates. I've developed custom AI tools using GPT and other APIs that reduced content production time by 40%, allowing teams to focus on strategic initiatives rather than repetitive tasks.
